title: Lie to Me
description: Ryder Montague and Dee Miller have been striking sparks off each other for years. They’ve blown hot and cold, argued, laughed, and clashed. Half the townsfolk wonder if they’ll kill each other, the other half if it will turn to romance.Dee knows what she wants, it’s the local playboy Paramedic who drives her nuts during the day and invades her dreams at night.No woman was ever going to pin bad boy Ryder down, but something is happening, something that will make him look at the curvy blonde with new eyes… but will it be too late?
author: Angela Verdenius
